Welcome to the Anti-Racist Postcard Project!

This is an anti-racism intervention art project to encourage folks to be üí• anti-racist. üí•

Our postcards playfully tackle issues of racism, implicit bias, anti-Blackness, and white supremacy. Each of our postcards tackle real social issues and forms of violence facing the world today (they‚Äôre just veiled as adorable cute messages). In sending them to our friends, family, and loved ones, we are encouraging them to learn more what‚Äôs going on and how they can also check their biases.

üñ§ We are your local anti-racists and we stand with Black Lives Matter and all folks working towards a just society.

Disclaimer: the names, addresses and data used in this project will not be shared publicly outside of sending the postcard, nor will they be sold or given to outside parties. Once the postcard is mailed, the name and address will be deleted from our database.
